snippet: The first weekend after the nominees for the 84th Academy Awards were announced, moviegoers offered modest help to the best-picture contenders at the box office while nytimes.com readers confirmed their early picks for the Oscars.
abstract: The first weekend after the nominees for the 84th Academy Awards were announced, moviegoers offered modest help to the best-picture contenders at the box office while nytimes.com readers confirmed their early picks for the Oscars.

headline.main: Times Readers Cling Tight to Early Oscar Leaders
